          <title>
            <string language="et">Koduloomad</string>
            <string language="en">Domestic animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haustiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux domestiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais domésticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali domestici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατοικίδια ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animales domésticos</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Illustreeritud slaidikava PowerPointis lasteaia lastele koduloomade tutvustamiseks. Iga looma kohta on lisatud väike luuletus.</string>
            <string language="en">Illustrated PowerPoint presentation for kindergarten children for introducing domestic animals. A little poem is added to each animal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Loomad</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erläuterte PowerPoint Darstellung für 
Kindergartenkinder für das Einführen der Haustiere. Ein 
kleines Gedicht wird jedem Tier hinzugefügt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation illustrée de PowerPoint pour des 
enfants de jardin d'enfants pour présenter les animaux domestiques. 
Une petite poésie est ajoutée à chaque animal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação ilustrada de PowerPoint para 
crianças do jardim de infância para introduzir animais domésticos. 
Um poema pequeno é adicionado a cada animal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione illustrata del PowerPoint per i 
bambini di asilo per l'introduzione degli animali domestici. Un 
poem piccolo è aggiunto ad ogni animale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διευκρινισμένη παρουσίαση PowerPoint για τα παιδιά 
παιδικών σταθμών για την εισαγωγή των κατοικίδιων ζώων. 
Ένα μικρό ποίημα προστίθεται σε κάθε ζώο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación ilustrada de PowerPoint para los 
niños del jardín de la infancia para introducir animales 
domésticos. Un pequeño poema se agrega a cada animal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
